abstract: About 15 African-American employees of McDonald's in Virginia who contend they were fired because of their race sue company, accusing it of not taking responsibility for discrimination and harassment they say they received.
lead_paragraph: The workers said in a federal complaint that about 15 African-American employees of some southern Virginia restaurants were fired last May after several white employees were hired.
